intro: Piptocarpha gracilis, commonly known as slender globemallow, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often found in sandy or gravelly soils. Piptocarpha gracilis is adapted to drought conditions and is often used in xeriscaping due to its low water requirements.
